value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I hope you're all ready to go. We've
got a mission in the western part
of the kingdom.$k$pWe're headed to an ancient ruin
known as the Eternal Sanctum.$k$pThe power that sleeps there will serve
as an aid to the Order of Heroes—I'm
sure of it!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|What are you talking about,
Commander? What sort of power is it?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|I don't know the details, I'll admit. But
Zacharias urged me to investigate
the ruin.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Zacharias did?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I see. Even though he can't rejoin us,
he's doing what he can to help.$k$p$EFace|Let's go! I want to see what lies in wait
for us there!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|So, this is the Eternal Sanctum...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I spy Heroes guarding it! We have no
choice but to show them what the
Order of Heroes is made of!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We've reached the bottom.$k$pThis stone slab looks significant. Let's
examine it...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Good eye, brother! There's definitely
some sort of writing engraved here...
Can you read it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|It's ancient Askran—and, as you can
see from the way the letters are
worn...it's very old. Let's see...$k$p"In rememberance of Askr, the Great
Pathfinder, we here inscribe..."$k$pThen, "Find you here a fragment of
the god-dragon Askr's Rite of
Awakening..."$k$p"Call forth the power...in the god-
dragon's Seals Sacrosanct..."$k$pIt keeps going like that, with details on
how to perform the rite.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Are you saying that the rite calls forth
the power in Sacred Seals?$k$p$EFace_Smile|That does sound worth pursuing. OK,
team! Back to base, armed with this
knowledge. We have work to do!$k$p$Sbs150|
